name: Yoga Fiber Tanks
description:
Crossover Tank
This comfortable stretchy tank stays where it should while the crossover design adds support where needed and is extra long for extra coverage. Great for inverted poses. You can dress it up with a jacket or sweater or pair it with a skirt. Luxurious bamboo fabric is super soft and feels like almost wearing nothing. 

Bamboo fabric is 95% Bamboo Viscose & 5% Spandex
Soy fabric is 50% Soy 44% Organic Cotton & 6% Spandex
Sizing
Small - fits most women size 0 to a small 4
Medium -  fits most women from a large 4 to a size 8
Large - fits most women size 10 to 12
X-Large - fits most women size 14-16


A Gathered Favorite Tank from Yoga Fibers
We are certain that you will love the freedom and support of this tank. Very flattering cut for most body types. Athletic design easily translates to casual and dressy. The racerback increases freedom of movement and the unique shelf bra design gives support to a range of sizes. Luxurious bamboo fabric is super soft and feels like almost wearing nothing. 

Black Bamboo fabric is 95% Bamboo Viscose & 5% Spandex Jersey

Sizing: This group of gathered tanks runs a bit large. We have applied appropriate discounts to help move the remaining inventory. This problem will be resolved with the next run. 
Small - fits most women size 2 to a small 6
Medium -  fits most women fromn 8 to a size 10
Large - fits most women size 12 to 14/16

Yoga Fibers by Threads of Humanity is dedicated to creating classic styles that offer amazing fit for a variety of body types for yoga, active lifestyles and just relaxing around the house. We provide apparel that has more meaning than simply hiding nakedness. We are not making just another workout outfit, we are helping to unite mindfulness with your wardrobe.  


See photos of naturally dyed swatches to see the colors available below.

A bit about natural dyes and color therapy.
These garments have been dyed ecologically, using color from nature. Color is therapeutic, affecting us on all levels: physical, mental, emotional & spiritual. Color helps balance & enhance our body's energy. Feel these colors become a part of you!

*Green: This color was derived from Indigo and Osage Orange and will help to connect you to the natural world and it's healing properties.
*Grey/Purple:  This colour was derived from Logwood and will help clear your mind, strengthen your metabolism, and help you to find inner balance.
*Blue:  This colour was derived from Indigo and will help to promote peaceful energy, calm & clear your mind, and help you to find truth.
*Dusty Rose: This colour is derived from Quebracho and will soothe & calm your emotions and alleviate 
aggressive feelings.
*Magenta/Bright Pink: This colour is derived from Cochineal and will help your spirit soar.
*Light Pink: This color is derived from Cochineal and will help to calm and soothe your emotions. 
*Red Orange: This color is derived from Madder root and will help to energize your spirit. 
*Rust/Warm Brown: This colour was derived from Acacia trees and will promote complete stability. 
*Yellow/Tan: This colour was derived from yellow onion skins or osage orange and helps to promote stability & encourages optimism, gives hope, warmth & energy.

name: Yoga Fibers Shorts
description:
Super Comfy Shorts Elastic- Naturally Dyed & Black
These comfortable shorts never need adjusting. Their simple mid-rise elastic waistband construction gives your body the freedom to be as flexible as you desire. Cropped at the knee to help you bend into all positions. 


Fold Down Short - Naturally Dyed & Black
These stylish shorts have a fold down waistband for a comfortable fit in the hip area. Cropped at the knee for freedom of movement. Very flattering for most shapes and sizes. This favorite comes in a variety of fabrics and colors.

Made in the U.S.A.

Available in 3 amazing fabrics:

*Hemp Jersey: 10 ounce: 53%Hemp, 43% Organic Cotton, 4% lycra
This antibacterial jersey fabric feels and fits just like your favorite stretchy T-shirt.  You will love the fit and feel of these lightweight shorts.

*Soy French Terry (58% Soy/ 37% Organic Cotton/ 5% Spandex)
This stretchy terry cloth fabric will help keep you dry.  One side is smooth and the other has shorter terry loops than traditional terry cloth.  You will love the lighter weight feel of these shorts.

*Hemp Terry Cloth: 11 ounce, 54%Hemp, 43% Organic Cotton, 3% lycra 
This antibacterial stretchy terry cloth fabric will help keep you dry.  One side is smooth and the other has traditional terry loops.  


Sizing
Small - fits most women size 0 to a small 4
Medium -  fits most women from a large 4 to a size 8
Large - fits most women size 10 to 12
X-Large - fits most women size 14-16

See photos of naturally dyed swatches to see the colors available below.  Colors not listed in options below can be ordered for additional cost...let me know if interested.

Yoga Fibers by Threads of Humanity is dedicated to creating classic styles that offer amazing fit for a variety of body types for yoga, active lifestyles and just relaxing around the house. Our mission is to explore therapeutic colors in nature and their ability to inspire, transform and heal our minds, body and spirits. We provide apparel that has more meaning than simply hiding nakedness. We are not making just another workout outfit, we are helping to unite mindfulness with your wardrobe.  

A bit about natural dyes and color therapy.
These garments have been dyed ecologically, using color from nature. Color is therapeutic, affecting us on all levels: physical, mental, emotional & spiritual. Color helps balance & enhance our body's energy. Feel these colors become a part of you!

*Green: This color was derived from Indigo and Osage Orange and will help to connect you to the natural world and it's healing properties.
*Grey/Purple:  This colour was derived from Logwood and will help clear your mind, strengthen your metabolism, and help you to find inner balance.
*Blue:  This colour was derived from Indigo and will help to promote peaceful energy, calm & clear your mind, and help you to find truth.
*Dusty Rose: This colour is derived from Quebracho and will soothe & calm your emotions and alleviate 
aggressive feelings.
*Magenta/Bright Pink: This colour is derived from Cochineal and will help your spirit soar.
*Light Pink: This color is derived from Cochineal and will help to calm and soothe your emotions. 
*Red Orange: This color is derived from Madder root and will help to energize your spirit. 
*Rust/Warm Brown: This colour was derived from Acacia trees and will promote complete stability. 
*Yellow/Tan: This colour was derived from yellow onion skins or osage orange and helps to promote stability & encourages optimism, gives hope, warmth & energy.

name: Repurposed Silk Gathered Scarf - by Threads of Humanity
description:
Have a little fun with this one of a kind silk gathered scarf.  Goes great with casual everyday looks as well as dressy fashions. 
74" by 7" Made from: 100% silk grey and black printed repurposed contemporary fabric, 100% silk velvet robins egg blue, black double-sided satin ribbon.
 
Made in the U.S.A.

name: 13" Laptop Sleeves of Vintage Fabrics
description:
Proclaim your individuality with a one of a kind laptop sleeve made from vintage fabrics. Keep your business cards handy at meetings with the super convenient business card pocket. This sleeve has a soft padded cloth interior to help protect your laptop from scratches, fingerprints and minor damages. Safely slide your laptop in and out of your backpack, briefcase or luggage with ease.  

*Fits most current laptops with a 13" display screen.
*Checkpoint friendly!
*Made in the U.S.A.
*Machine wash with like colors on gentle, line dry, iron on low heat.
*Exterior Measures 14" by 11" and 1" of fluffy protection

TH1009 Soft Vintage Navy Blue Twill Cotton, Vintage Maroon Cotton Lining, and Vintage Blue Flower Cotton Print Business Card Pocket. Photo 1 

TH1010 Vintage Cotton Brown/ Orange/Gold Blossoming Tree Print, Vintage Cotton Lining and Business Card Pocket. Photos 2 & 3

TH1011 Vintage Cotton Green/Black Leaf Print w/matching biz card pocket, Lined in Black Repurposed Soft n Silky Polyester. Photo 4 & 5

name: Mr. Misters:  Everyday all natural aromatherapy.
description:
Mr. Misters:  All natural aromatherapy misters that complement your daily activities. Utilize nature’s bounty with one of seven handcrafted formulas. Enhance your life at home, at the office and everywhere in between.

Mr. BuzzOff 
All natural mosquito repellent.
Keep the mosquitos away with this helpful blend of essential oils.  All natural mosquito repellant for the whole family. Handcrafted with citronella, lavender and lemongrass essential oils.  Highly effective and pleasantly scented...for bug spray.

Mr. Chill
Relax and rest well!
A soothing blend of lavender & chamomile essential oils to help calm your nerves & relax your senses. Mist on your pillows before you lay down for a peaceful nights' rest. Helps to relieve sunburns, tension and headaches.

Mr. Femme 
Soothes emotions!
Accentuate the positive aspects of being a woman while alleviating the negative with this soothing, lightly floral and citrus blend of essential oils.  Helps to relieve negative feelings and emotional distress as well as menstrual cramps and PMS symptoms.

Mr. Holiday
Sweet 'n Spicy!
Enjoy the holiday season year round with this warming blend of cinnamon & clove essential oils. 

Mr. Mountain
Crisp 'n fresh
Formerly Mr. Man, this invigorating blend of juniper and citrus is reminiscent of crisp mountain air. Use as a body mister, room, car and linen freshener. (CAUTION: Not recommended for pregnant women, people with epilepsy, or high blood pressure.)

Mr. Orange
Sweet 'n Happy!
Invite happiness into your life with this sweet blend of orange & vanilla essential oils.  Just try to be unhappy after a whiff of Mr. Orange and kids love it!

Mr. Pep E. Mint
Cool down and wake up!
Invigorating essential oil of peppermint to relieve, refresh & revive. This cooling mister is super refreshing for hot summery days, brings relief to migraine sufferers and increases blood circulation. (Caution:  Not recommended for pregnant women.)

Mr. Uplifter
Lift your spirits and awaken your mind.
A refreshing blend of essential oils, including rosemary & citrus to energize the spirit & awaken the mind. (CAUTION: Not recommended for pregnant women, people with epilepsy, or high blood pressure.)
